name: Don't mess with Sasha
description:
This is a prototype for a game idea I've had in mind for a long time.

You play as Sasha , a mutant dog that's been inprisoned for research purposes. You managed to break free and now you will try to escape. Every weapon you pick up only has ONE bullet left, so aim carefully.

Controls:

Movement - WASD
Aim - Mouse
Shooting - LMB
Melee Attack (Only works if you don't have a weapon equipped) - Spacebar

I hope you enjoy it and I'm open to constructive feedback.
